main event: A 12-year-old boy reported seeing a blue light that moved behind a cloud for approximately 15 minutes near Springfield, Virginia.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on the night of 2 August 1965 and was witnessed by two individuals., The object appeared to make a turn and proceeded downward., The observer, a 5-year-old boy, claimed the object was blue in color., There is a possibility that the sighting could be attributed to an aircraft landing at Dulles International Airport., The report contained sketches and diagrams, but no photographs.
sighted object: a blue light behind a cloud
witness description: a 5-year-old boy and another witness named Mr. Rodger
